title: GASQ
instructions: Please rate how much you agree or disagree with each of the following statements:

q_text.text: The reasons underlying my performance in this game lie outside of me.
How well I did in this game was completely due to me.
My effort determined how well I did in this game.
In this game, my performance was determined by my abilities.
Players have very little influence over their score in this game.
It is in a player's power to become better at this game.
Players are responsible for their performance in this game.
The reasons for my performance in this game will stay the same in future games.
Whatever affected my performance will continue to affect me in future games.
The cause for my performance in this game will always be present.
The reason for my performance is something that affects other areas of my life.
Whatever caused my score in this game is only important in the context of games.
My performance in this game is typical for my general abilities in other areas of life.
